reviews.content: The fruit teapots are bottomless and delicious, sweet and golden. Classy enough for an informal business meeting. Can also recommend the office lunch: more expensive than ordering a plastic foam box, but quality, service and setting justify the multiplier.
The ‚Äúsignature dish‚Äù was mediocre. The pickled veggies were so foul, the taste still haunts me a day later. The waiter didn‚Äôt speak English.

Overall, it's okay. The restaurant is a villa, the interior is decorated in a classic style, the space is quite open and spacious, there are 2 areas. When I went, it was quite crowded, the inside area was a bit stuffy and smelled of ‚Ä¶

The restaurant is an old villa, located on a street near Hoan Kiem Lake, quite beautiful. The decoration is neoclassical style, quite harmonious. However, the food is bad, the breakfast food is not rich and the presentation is a bit sloppy. ‚Ä¶
A surprisingly good latte place. The atmosphere is perfect for women. I enjoyed it even more because I visited in the morning when there weren't many customers.
The cafe here is chill, the seating has light and convenient parking.
Food is okay, service is ok, price is higher than other restaurants

Super cute. The shop is crowded but the staff is enthusiastic. Yesterday morning I stopped by for breakfast, coffee and work and forgot an iPad. When I came back this afternoon, the staff enthusiastically returned it without any requests + so enthusiastic that it was adorable. Vote 5* to say thank you.
Airy space, menu suitable for all ages. Enthusiastic and friendly service.
I came here after seeing a review of the cigar and the staff were very friendly.
